data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 3, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
In the minute 8, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Napoli close to the penalty box.
In Naples, Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Torino to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Torino.
Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Torino's area.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Torino.
Torino's Simone Verdi is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Torino.
In the minute 16, Important block from the Torino defence as Giovanni Di Lorenzo fires in a strike for Napoli.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Napoli pushes forward through Matteo Politano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Napoli drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 23, Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Torino's half.
Torino's Andrea Belotti gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
In the minute 25, Free kick Torino.
Torino to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
Torino's Andrea Belotti gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Napoli defender.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Eljif Elmas is replacing Diego Demme for Napoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Armando Izzo (Torino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Torino.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Torino's Armando Izzo has been booked in Naples.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
Paolo Valeri awards Napoli a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Elseid Hysaj of Napoli gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Can Torino capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 39, Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Torino's half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Torino push forward at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona and Karol Linetty gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Napoli defence.
In the minute 40, Free kick Napoli.
At Stadio Diego Armando Maradona, Alessandro Buongiorno has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Napoli's Piotr Zielinski misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 41, Paolo Valeri awards Torino a goal kick.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Napoli.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
In Naples Napoli drive forward through Piotr Zielinski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Paolo Valeri waits before resuming play because Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli is still down.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli is back on the field again.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Torino.
In the minute 45, Torino have a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Paolo Valeri signals a Torino throw-in in Napoli's half.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Naples Napoli attack through Lorenzo Insigne. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
In the minute 51, Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Napoli are pushing forward but Piotr Zielinski's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
In the minute 52, Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Napoli are in shooting range from this free kick.
Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Andrea Belotti (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Goal! Armando Izzo gives Torino a 0-1 lead in Naples.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Napoli.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Napoli's Piotr Zielinski breaks free at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Hirving Lozano is replacing Matteo Politano for the home team.
Tiemoue Bakayoko for Napoli has been booked by Paolo Valeri and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 64, Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino.
Torino are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 66, At Stadio Diego Armando Maradona, Napoli are penalized for being offside.
Napoli to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Napoli in Naples.
In the minute 68, Paolo Valeri awards Torino a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Napoli!
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Torino.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) is making a third substitution, with Fernando Llorente replacing Andrea Petagna.
The home team have replaced Elseid Hysaj with Mario Rui. This is the fourth substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
In the minute 71, Fabian Ruiz is on a sub for Tiemoue Bakayoko for Napoli.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Napoli.
In the minute 73, Napoli have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 75, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Napoli.
Karol Linetty (Torino) has received a yellow card from Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Torino defenders.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Napoli push forward at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona and Giovanni Di Lorenzo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Torino defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Torino in the half of Napoli.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tomas Rincon.
Torino's Tomas Rincon is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 84, Napoli needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Naples.
Torino's Andrea Belotti gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Hirving Lozano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Napoli.
Free kick Napoli.
Torino to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In the minute 87, In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Eljif Elmas for Napoli has been booked by Paolo Valeri and receives a first yellow card.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona with Mergim Vojvoda replacing Ricardo Rodriguez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Andrea Belotti with Simone Zaza. This is the second substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
The away team replace Sasa Lukic with Soualiho Meite.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Torino.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Napoli to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli.
Fernando Llorente (Napoli) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Napoli.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Lorenzo Insigne gets an equalizer for Napoli. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Piotr Zielinski to set up the goal.
Torino make their fourth substitution with Jacopo Segre replacing Karol Linetty.
Napoli's Giovanni Di Lorenzo has been booked in Naples.
